initcondition.formula: isEmpty("Bank Verified Document") = 'F' AND "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "User" IN ("Employee1","Employee2")

returnusererroraction.errortext: Before Proceeding, Please make sure following checklist is complete 1. Company Phone Validated 2. Verification Call Done 3. Communication Sub Tab Updated

initcondition.formula: isChecked("Company Phone Validated") = 'F' AND isChecked("Verification Call Done") = 'F' AND isChecked("Communication Subtab Updated") = 'F'
isChecked("Company Phone Validated") = 'T' AND isChecked("Verification Call Done") = 'T' AND isChecked("Communication Subtab Updated") = 'T'

returnusererroraction.errortext: Make Sure to check MELIO record updated
Make Sure the record is double checked
